flawed_nl_solution:
Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<40*60=2040>>2040 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 2040 - 1200 = <<2040-1200=840>>840 words more than Micah in an hour.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 2040. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
